mapper.select: SELECT u.userName userName, s.introduce introduce, u.userAddress userAddress, s.totalServiceCnt totalServiceCnt, s.totalServiceScore totalServiceScore FROM tbl_sitter as s left join tbl_user as u on s.userNumber = u.userNumber WHERE u.userAddress like concat("%", #{keyword} ,"%");

SELECT u.userName userName, s.introduce introduce, u.userAddress userAddress, s.totalServiceCnt totalServiceCnt, s.totalServiceScore totalServiceScore FROM tbl_sitter as s left join tbl_user as u on s.userNumber = u.userNumber order by totalServiceCnt desc;
